document.full_text: a late decision to stick with his old putter paid immediate dividends for american garrett willis as he charged into an early one-shot lead in the heritage first round on thursday.
document.title: pacesetting willis stays loyal to old putter at heritage
lines_and_colors: a late decision to stick with his old putter paid immediate dividends for american garrett willis as he charged into an early one-shot lead in the heritage first round on thursday.
